group_1.textRight: Uh.@I’m back…

group_1.textLeft: Next time, call me if you’re gonna be late.@I gotta know when dinner’s gonna be, ‘kay?

group_1.textRight: [chara:102401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Geez, looks like you’re the early one today.

group_1.textLeft: I mean, you’re awfully late.@What’ve you been doing…?

group_1.textRight: …Mediating some sorta beef?
A couple buddies were having some disagreement.
They wanna hear my side of it too,@so they held me up.

group_1.textLeft: See, that's proof they trust you.
So, you came to an agreement?

group_1.textRight: Things got a bit messy, but I got ‘em to agree.
I don’t get it myself… It's like I got this oddass@feeling that I can’t get off my chest.
Dunno, man. This feeling’s fuzzy as heck,@it’s gettin’ me all hot and bothered.

group_1.textLeft: Might be just that your emotions’ pent-up.
Hey, in that case,@let's eat pork cutlet to get rid of them.

group_1.textRight: But why pork cutlet?

group_1.textLeft: I gotta win the land fight we talked ‘bout the other@day, even if it means gettin’ sacked.

group_1.textRight: Oh, so the pork cutlet’s just for your convenience!
Ah well, whatever…@But, sounds like you’re in more trouble than me.
When’s that gonna be…?

group_1.textLeft: Y’know the drill: if we’re eating pork cutlets today, tomorrow’s the big day.

group_1.textRight: Hey, you okay with boxing after work…?

group_1.textLeft: Easy-peasy.@I’m going for a double win, see?

group_1.narration: “I ain't got no taste for gettin' beaten up,@nor am I mature enough to ignore stains of@the past jus’ ‘cause things are goin' well now,@so I'd better start winnin' for what I lost,@or the weight in my heart ain’t never going away.”

group_1.textRight: Whatcha gonna do if you lose?

group_1.textLeft: Ain't nothing harder to take than not having@a shot at revenge. Dontcha agree?

group_1.textRight: You really are my old man, aintcha.

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, is that respect I hear?

group_1.textRight: No, just the sound of my heart dropping@at how much alike we are.

group_1.textLeft: Oughta be the other way 'round.@YOU resemble ME.

group_1.textRight: You got that right. Heehee!
So, I sure as hell gotta get myself pumped-up@with pork cutlets today.

group_1.textLeft: Dunno, but I take it you're plannin’@to get yourself a win too?

group_1.textRight: Yep, I gotta settle that beef I talked ‘bout earlier.

group_1.textLeft: Well then, let’s go for it together—@father and daughter!

group_1.textRight: Damn straight!

group_1.narration: I feel for our little helper, but I found out@what’s been weighing on my heart all this time,@what’s been eating me inside all along.
Turns out it's about my loss to you,@Yuna.

group_1.textCenter: We’ve gotta fight it out, toe-to-toe.
But if you’re up for it,@you best believe I’ll take you on with all my heart.
With my old man as worked-up as I am,@we can't lose!
